item.title: Setup subdomains on VPS CentOS
item.description: TLDR Code sources Create Projects Creating three example projects: node.js express server that returns json on request another node.js express server static html page Place projects data in dir ‘projects’. Structure: └── project ├── Dockerfile ├── nginx.conf ├── projects | ├── 1 | | ├── app.js | | └── package.json | ├── 2 | | ├── app.js | | └── package.json | └── 3 | └── index.html └── start.sh Nginx setup Server needs to “understand” the initial subdomain and where to forward.
